text: Mahdavia ( mahdawi) is a Mahdi'ist movement founded in the 15th century which follows the principles set forth by Syed Jaunpuri. A subsect of Mahdavia, called Zikri, is mostly practised in Pakistan.Azhar MunÄ«r, I. A. Rehman. Zikris in the light of history & their religious beliefs, Izharsons, 1998. ==References== Category:Islamic denominations
title: Mahdavia
